content.rendered:
Himalaya Airlines is a Nepalese airline operating from Tribhuvan International Airport in Kathmandu, Nepal. Himalaya Airlines was founded in 2014 as a joint venture between Yeti World Investment and Tibet Airlines. It is the second attempt of Yeti Airlines Group to launch an international airline based in Nepal, following the collapse of Fly Yeti in 2008. It launched operations in May 2016 with a single Airbus A320. The airline flies to five destinations as of July 2018.

 

 Queries handled Himalaya Airlines Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries.  

List of Himalaya Airlines Offices Worldwide

Qatar – Doha
Malaysia – Kuala Lumpur
UAE – Dubai
Saudi Arabia – Dammam
Hong Kong – Wanchai
Sri Lanka – Colombo 
Myanmar – Yangon
Kuwait – Kuwait City
Bangladesh – Dhaka

List of Himalaya Airlines Offices

Nepal – Kathmandu
Nepal – Kathmandu
Nepal – Kathmandu
Nepal – Kathmandu
Nepal – Kathmandu
Nepal – Kathmandu

  Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Himalaya Airlines Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Himalaya Airlines: (click on the stars below)
